category.name: Metadata Requirements
category.description: A number of metadata fields are required to make the metadata record of a publication RIOXX compliant.
category.resolutionHint: This submission doesn't have all the required metadata fields. Please complete the missing metadata fields.

rule.description: The title, and any sub-titles, of the resource must be provided. The title should be represented using the original spelling and wording.
rule.resolutionHint: Please fill in the title and any sub-titles of this item.

rule.description: The author of the resource may be a person, organisation or service, but is most commonly a person and must be provided.
rule.resolutionHint: Please provided all authors listed on this publication.

rule.description: This refers to the primary language in which the content of the resource is presented. Values used for this element must be provided conform to ISO 639â€“3.
rule.resolutionHint: Please fill in the language ISO code.

rule.description: The date on which the resource was accepted for publication. The date must be filled in specifying year, month and day.
rule.resolutionHint: Please fill in the date of acceptance specifying year, month and day.

rule.description: Type refers to the 'type' - the nature or genre of the content of the resource and must be provided.
rule.resolutionHint: Please provide the type of the publication described by this item.

rule.description: This element must indicate which 'version' of the resource is being described.
rule.resolutionHint: Please specify the RIOXX version of this item.
rule.fieldDescription: RIOXX version of the deposited file

rule.description: The item must specify a URI that points to a resource that expresses the license terms specifying how the item may be used.
rule.resolutionHint: Please fill in at least one valid rights URI into the field rioxxterms.licenseref.uri or dc.rights.uri.

category.name: File Access Requirements
category.description: The item must provide a URL that should point to the actual resource being described by the RIOXX record (typically a file in MS Word or PDF format), rather than to an intermediary resource such as a repository web page. In addition, the item's metadata must be publicly available.
category.resolutionHint: Please check if your item is publicly available and that the full text was uploaded in the repository or that a url to the file is provided in the Openaccess uri field.

rule.description: A compliant deposit must have at least one file.
rule.resolutionHint: Please upload the file that corresponds to this RIOXX record. Alternatively you can provide a direct URL to the file in the field rioxxterms.openaccess.uri.

rule.description: A RIOXX open access uri is required if you did not upload a file.
rule.resolutionHint: Please fill in the URI of the location where the full text of your item is available.

rule.description: The item must be discoverable by anonymous users and robots.
rule.resolutionHint: Please make sure that the item is not withdrawn and that there are no resource policies on this item that prevent it from being publicly available.

rule.description: An item can only be discoverable if it has been fully archived in the repository.

category.name: Funding Requirements
category.description: The RIOXX policy requires that an item provides project ID(s), issued by funder(s), that relate to the resource, together with the name and/or global identifier for the funder(s).
category.resolutionHint: Your item must specify a project identifier that is linked to an official funder. Please correct this in the submission form or using the admin 'Edit Item' page.

rule.description: An item must contain at least one project ID, an alphanumeric identifier provided by the funder in its original format. In cases where the resource has been funded internally, an appropriate internal code might be used.
rule.resolutionHint: Please specify the project identifier related to this item in the submission form or using the admin 'Edit Item' page.

rule.description: The item must be linked to a funder (through a project) that was selected using the submission form or the admin edit item page.
rule.resolutionHint: Please lookup the funder related to this item in the submission form or using the admin 'Edit Item' page.
